reviews.content: Shows up in settings but does not work (A12).
thank you Best tweak working for A12 Xs Max how to use A11/A12 press vol+ and leave press vol- and leave and press hold power you see magic https://mobile.twitter.com/iosliber

How to activate on IPhone XS:
Quickly press Volume Up, quickly press Volume Down, hold power button.

Modern style resprings my phone.
